mil3.2.4:0.3: Question on the Feelings of an Individual Reconnecting
mil3.2.4:1.2: Venerable Nāgasena, does one who does not reconnect feel a painful feeling?
mil3.2.4:1.4: “He feels some, and he does not feel others.”
mil3.2.4:1.5: “Which does he feel, and which does he not feel?”
mil3.2.4:1.6: “He feels bodily feelings, your majesty, and he does not feel mental feelings.”
mil3.2.4:1.7: “How, venerable sir, does he feel bodily feelings, and how does he not feel mental feelings?”
mil3.2.4:1.8: “There is no ceasing of that cause and condition for the arising of a painful bodily feeling, and thus he feels a painful bodily feeling. There is ceasing of that cause and condition for the arising of a painful mental feeling, and thus he does not feel a painful mental feeling.
mil3.2.4:6.1: Question on the Feelings of an Individual Reconnecting fourth
